text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Sermersooq Municipality | native_name = Kommuneqarfik Sermersooq | native_name_lang = kl | type = Municipality | image_skyline = Sermersooq-montage.jpg | image_alt = Sermersooq Municipality | image_caption = Clockwise from top left: Nuuk, Kulusuk, Tasiilaq, Kangertittivaq | image_flag = Flag of Sermersooq, Denmark.svg | image_shield = Sermersooq-coat-of-arms.png | shield_alt = | image_map = Sermersooq in Greenland 2018.svg | map_alt = | map_caption = Location of Sermersooq within Greenland | mapsize = 250px | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = Sermersooq Commune | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = State | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = Constituent country | subdivision_name1 = | subdivision_type2 = Municipality | subdivision_name2 = Sermersooq | subdivision_type3 = | subdivision_name3 = | established_title = Established | established_date = 1 January 2009 | seat_type = Municipal center | seat = Nuuk | government_footnotes = Sermersooq Municipality: Administration | leader_party = Inuit Ataqatigiit | leader_title = Mayor | leader_name = Asii Chemnitz Narup | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 531900 | area_total_sq_mi = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 21868 | population_as_of = 2013 | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone1 = UTC-03, UTC-01 | area_code_type = Calling code | area_code = +299 | iso_code = GL-SM | website = sermersooq.gl | footnotes = }} Sermersooq (Greenlandic: [seʁmeʁsoːq̚], place of much ice, ) is the most populous municipality of Greenland. Its capital and largest city is Nuuk, which is also the capital and largest city of Greenland. It was created on 1 January 2009, when five municipalities were combined together to make Sermersooq. == Geography == Sermersooq borders the Labrador Sea to the west and the Denmark Strait to the east. It borders all the municipalities of Kujalleq, Qeqqata, Qeqertalik and Avannaata. To the north is Northeast Greenland National Park. == References == Category:2000s establishments in Denmark Category:2009 establishments in North America Category:Municipalities of Greenland
title: Sermersooq
